mapper.select:
SELECT *, IF ( ABS ( RTON - FSIGNTONNUM )/ FSIGNTONNUM * 100 <= 2 AND ABS ( BMTON - FSIGNTONNUM )/ FSIGNTONNUM * 100 <= 2 AND ABS ( BQTON - FSIGNTONNUM )/ FSIGNTONNUM * 100 <= 2 AND ABS ( BJTON - FSIGNTONNUM )/ FSIGNTONNUM * 100 <= 2, "合格", IF (( COMPANY = '02' AND ABS(( BQTON - FSIGNTONNUM )/ FSIGNTONNUM * 100 )<= 2 AND ABS(( BMTON - FSIGNTONNUM )/ FSIGNTONNUM * 100 )<= 2 AND ABS(( RTON - FSIGNTONNUM )/ FSIGNTONNUM * 100 )<= 4 ) OR ( COMPANY = '06' AND ABS(( BQTON - FSIGNTONNUM )/ FSIGNTONNUM * 100 )<= 2 AND ABS(( BJTON - FSIGNTONNUM )/ FSIGNTONNUM * 100 )<= 2 AND ABS(( RTON - FSIGNTONNUM )/ FSIGNTONNUM * 100 )<= 4 ) OR ( COMPANY = '07' AND ABS(( BJTON - FSIGNTONNUM )/ FSIGNTONNUM * 100 )<= 2 AND ABS(( BMTON - FSIGNTONNUM )/ FSIGNTONNUM * 100 )<= 2 AND ABS(( RTON - FSIGNTONNUM )/ FSIGNTONNUM * 100 )<= 4 ) OR ( COMPANY = '09' AND ABS(( BMTON - FSIGNTONNUM )/ FSIGNTONNUM * 100 )<= 2 AND ABS(( BQTON - FSIGNTONNUM )/ FSIGNTONNUM * 100 )<= 2 AND ABS(( RTON - FSIGNTONNUM )/ FSIGNTONNUM * 100 )<= 4 ), '基本合格', IF (( RTON - FSIGNTONNUM )/ FSIGNTONNUM * 100 > 2 AND ( BMTON - FSIGNTONNUM )/ FSIGNTONNUM * 100 > 2 AND ( BQTON - FSIGNTONNUM )/ FSIGNTONNUM * 100 > 2 AND ( BJTON - FSIGNTONNUM )/ FSIGNTONNUM * 100 > 2, '签数异常', IF (( RTON - FSIGNTONNUM )/ FSIGNTONNUM * 100 < - 2 AND ( BMTON - FSIGNTONNUM )/ FSIGNTONNUM * 100 < - 2 AND ( BQTON - FSIGNTONNUM )/ FSIGNTONNUM * 100 < - 2 AND ( BJTON - FSIGNTONNUM )/ FSIGNTONNUM * 100 < - 2, '签数负异常', IF ( ABS( GREATEST( RTON, BMTON, BJTON, BQTON )- LEAST( RTON, BMTON, BJTON, BQTON ))/ LEAST( RTON, BMTON, BJTON, BQTON ) * 100 < 2, '记录异常', IF (( COMPANY = '02' AND ( ABS(( BQTON - FSIGNTONNUM )/ FSIGNTONNUM * 100 )> 2 AND ABS(( BMTON - FSIGNTONNUM )/ FSIGNTONNUM * 100 )> 2 ) OR ABS(( RTON - FSIGNTONNUM )/ FSIGNTONNUM * 100 )> 4 ) OR ( COMPANY = '06' AND ( ABS(( BQTON - FSIGNTONNUM )/ FSIGNTONNUM * 100 )> 2 AND ABS(( BJTON - FSIGNTONNUM )/ FSIGNTONNUM * 100 )> 2 ) OR ABS(( RTON - FSIGNTONNUM )/ FSIGNTONNUM * 100 )> 4 ) OR ( COMPANY = '07' AND ( ABS(( BJTON - FSIGNTONNUM )/ FSIGNTONNUM * 100 )> 2 AND ABS(( BMTON - FSIGNTONNUM )/ FSIGNTONNUM * 100 ))> 2 OR ABS(( RTON - FSIGNTONNUM )/ FSIGNTONNUM * 100 )> 4 ) OR ( COMPANY = '09' AND ( ABS(( BMTON - FSIGNTONNUM )/ FSIGNTONNUM * 100 )> 2 AND ABS(( BQTON - FSIGNTONNUM )/ FSIGNTONNUM * 100 ))> 2 OR ABS(( RTON - FSIGNTONNUM )/ FSIGNTONNUM * 100 )> 4 ), '不合格', '不合格' ) ) ) ) ) ) AS STATE from T_V_SHIPMAIN
where COMPANY = #{str_company}
